# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be an exceptional addition to your collection. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950000, considering its worth to you and our desire to see it in capable hands. We trust this offer will allow you to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
